title: Campus-based management system MVP with notifications (Internet Computer stack)

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and store a user profile record (principal, display name, optional department/program) that is created on first login and can be updated by the user.

quotes: campus based management system with real time notification in python ,html , css,javascript ,my Sql,etc

acceptanceCriteria: A user can sign in using Internet Identity and is shown as authenticated in the UI
On first login, a profile is created in the Motoko canister keyed by the user principal
The user can update their display name and department/program from the UI and changes persist after refresh

requirements.text: Provide core campus content management for announcements: create, list, view details, and delete announcements, with each announcement containing title, body, author principal, and created timestamp.

quotes: campus based management system with real time notification in python ,html , css,javascript ,my Sql,etc

acceptanceCriteria: Announcements can be created from the UI and persist in the backend
Announcements list is ordered by newest first and supports viewing a single announcement detail page/section
Only the author (or an admin role if implemented) can delete an announcement
Timestamps are displayed in a readable format in the UI

requirements.text: Implement a notifications feature backed by announcement activity: when a new announcement is created, add a notification entry (type, reference id, message, created timestamp) and expose APIs to fetch notifications for a user and mark them as read.

quotes: campus based management system with real time notification in python ,html , css,javascript ,my Sql,etc

acceptanceCriteria: Creating an announcement results in a new notification stored in the backend
The UI shows a notifications list with read/unread state
Users can mark notifications as read and the state persists
Notification items link to (or open) the relevant announcement

requirements.text: Implement near-real-time notification updates on the frontend using polling (no WebSockets): periodically refetch notifications and show an in-app toast/badge when new unread notifications arrive.
acceptanceCriteria: Notifications are automatically refreshed on an interval (configurable in code)
A visible badge shows the count of unread notifications
When new unread notifications are detected, the UI displays a toast/alert without requiring a manual refresh

requirements.text: Create an initial app navigation and layout for the MVP with pages/sections for: Sign in, Dashboard, Announcements, Notifications, and Profile.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate between Dashboard, Announcements, Notifications, and Profile
Unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in and cannot create announcements
The layout is responsive and usable on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a campus management app and enforce it consistently across all screens.
acceptanceCriteria: All screens share consistent typography, spacing, and component styling
Theme does not use a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly required later
UI uses Tailwind + existing UI components via composition (no edits to immutable UI component sources)

requirements.text: Persist all backend data (profiles, announcements, notifications, read state) in stable structures in the single Motoko actor so data survives canister upgrades (add migration only if required by the template/state handling).
acceptanceCriteria: Data persists across page reloads and subsequent queries
Data is stored in the Motoko canister (no external DB like MySQL)
If an upgrade path is needed, state migration is handled according to the project migration policy (conditional)

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., app header/login screen) by serving them from frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the React UI
Images load correctly in the running app without any backend image routing

constraints: Use the Internet Computer stack: Motoko single-actor backend and React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query frontend (do not implement Python/MySQL).
Do not implement WebSockets/Socket.io; implement notification updates via polling/refetch.
Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
nonGoals: Full student information system (enrollment, grades, attendance) unless requested explicitly.
Integration with external email/SMS/push notification services.
Third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.

required: Campus management app logo mark, simple geometric + academic motif (campus-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration of a modern university campus scene, minimal flat style (campus-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
